comet.data¶

comet.data.clean(time_series, runs=None, detrend=False, confounds=None, standardize=False, standardize_confounds=True, filter='butterworth', low_pass=None, high_pass=None, t_r=0.72, ensure_finite=False)[source]¶

Standard nilearn cleaning of the time series

Load simulated time series data with two randomly changing connectivity states
